trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Schererville
There were no other sightings in Schererville on or around September 27th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsIn Schererville, In. outside of our home walking our dogs, I saw an airplane in the sky, and then saw the three disks shaped lights. Was not sure if it was from the airplane but they stayed the same long after the plane was gone, and were present before. We were curious of them, the three moved back and forth, we had to go in the house, they were still in the sky.
